note: We're working hard to address these issues in the next update. Thank you for your feedback!

openIssues.title: No email verification and forgot password
openIssues.description: Currently, users cannot verify their email or reset their password. These features are planned for the next update.

openIssues.title: Closing the app logs users out
openIssues.description: Users are logged out when closing the app. We're working on persistent login for the next update.

openIssues.title: “Share with friends” link missing App Store link
openIssues.description: The share feature does not include the App Store link. This will be fixed in the next update.

openIssues.title: Inaccurate drill/preference/streak data after login/logout
openIssues.description: Sometimes, logging in or out shows incorrect drill, preference, or streak data. We're investigating and will improve data sync.
